entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
